channel.title: Creation
channel.description: As I don't have a RuneScape account (or have much knowledge about RuneScape), I am going to be creating an account right now in order to help me with the development of my server. I am going to be studying RuneScape thoroughly to make sure that I can create a great server that is the RuneScape that you all know and love with a mix of easy leveling (not by too much sorry), money making (again not by too much), and of course pking. Let me just create the account then I will post my username and maybe we can play some time :)

item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=the elve age link=topic=500108.msg3658347#msg3658347 date=1310178781]
You won’t get the “Runescape experience” in 3 months. It takes years, of actually knowing what you’re talking about.
[/quote]Not entirely true. Wintercannon had programming experience with Java, yet no RSPS. Came and made 2 frameworks within 3 months.[/quote]
Frameworks don’t consist of gameplay.

Read full topic

item.title: Creation
item.dc:creator: @GML_Programmer GML Programmer
item.description:
@GML_Programmer wrote:

Im aiming for 3 months with the pace that Im working at now, but Im not exactly sure. I already implemented a new combat system that is really quite unique. Thats all Im saying at the moment. Java is quite simple actually so with my previous programming experience and what I am learning I am going to completely revolutionize how rsps are made. I quit the hyperion and am making my own base now and I know tons are going to use it. Prepare for something great.

Read full topic

item.title: Creation
item.dc:creator: @DevilsCape DevilsCape
item.description:
@DevilsCape wrote:

when do you think u will finish?

predictions?

i know it will take long long time to make a great server when ur still learning and experiencing the game … and java

but everyone plan’s and then predict the date his finishing>>

so when do you guess ur finishing this?

Read full topic

item.title: Creation
item.dc:creator: @GML_Programmer GML Programmer
item.description:
@GML_Programmer wrote:

Im glad I have so much support. It really helps push me to create a great server. Of course when I am finished I will be releasing it completely open source as always with my projects. I am here for a learning experience and knowledge. Not money.

Read full topic

item.title: Creation
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

dont forget to check knowledge websites like runescape.wikia.com i think they have somethings figured out that will possibly save u time, by reading instead of studying most aspect of the game and trying to figure out how it works. just a though. if i was going to try doing what u are trying to do, i would make it easier on myself by reading other peoples observations.

Read full topic

item.title: Creation
item.dc:creator: @GML_Programmer GML Programmer
item.description:
@GML_Programmer wrote:

Oh I have been studying alot reading up on quests, learning the map, about runescape past and present, and loads more. I am dedicated to make this a great server. I purchased 3 java books yesterday to teach me and I have the mopar tutorials ( ;D) so I think I will be ok. Im just making the account to help me decide on how I should approach making the server. I am going to be keeping this account though also just to play lol.

Read full topic
